cn.releaseNotes:
- 歌曲包「Tanchiky 精选集」现已推出
- 歌曲包「NOISZ SL + PK GODHAND 联动」现已推出
- 复刻活动限时开启，歌曲「Flashdance」、驾驶员「荷珀+伊洛 -Re：End-」以及限定头像等众多奖励。
- 新增1首基础歌曲「Sakura rain」
- 允许放大明信片后拖动
- 修复了一些bug
cn.description:
《旋转音律》是一款活用了手机陀螺仪功能的体感音乐游戏。力求带来前所未有的崭新音乐游戏体验。
旋转手机，感受在星河间穿梭的快感。带上耳机，共赴鼓点与星光相伴的宇宙之旅。

=用体感，玩音乐=
不同于传统音游的点按式判定，在《旋转音律》中，你需要通过快速旋转手机来完成部分音符的判定——就像驾驶赛车穿越急弯那样。这将会是如同街机般爽快的音乐游戏体验。

=风格多变的音乐曲目=
众多音游知名曲师参与供稿并提供独家曲目！节奏电音、JPOP、西方歌剧、韩文流行、重金摇滚，风格多样不单调。更有丰富新曲目定期加入游戏曲库。

=梦与约定之地，爱与成长之旅=
跟随伊洛踏上宇宙之旅，追寻友人的足迹，邂逅不同星球的居民，拯救阿古亚星的命运。一路见证伊洛的成长吧！

问题反馈：rotaeno@xd.com

cn.trackName: 随手记Pro–个人家庭生意记账
cn.releaseNotes:
-【控制中心支持记一笔控件】支持将记一笔按钮添加到：系统下拉控制中心中，或替换锁屏手电筒按钮，iPhone15以上更支持侧边控制按钮一件打开记一笔，打开记一笔快人一步！
-【iOS26系统支持】修复了iOS26下深色、透明模式系统小组件变白等问题。

最近更新：
-【数据导入】适配微信账单导出格式变更，数据导入新增支持 Excel 表格文件；
-【记一笔优化】记一笔时间选择弹窗支持快速切换年月，提升补账效率；
-【语音记账】神象云账本支持AI语音记账！你说话，AI记，记账和聊天一样轻松，还支持一句话同时记多笔。快长按 账本首页/记一笔 体验吧。
cn.description:
多赚会花每一天，记账就要随手记！个人、家庭、生意账随心选。
记账快捷又专业，轻松管理多人记账。多维度账单解读，全面了解你的财务状况。账单数据实时存，云端数据不丢失。

【神象云账本】
- 记一笔记账快捷又专业
- 账本首页流水页，数据呈现更清晰
- 云端存储数据，安全不丢失
- 账本操作必留痕，安全又省心

【海量账本模板，陪伴你的各个人生阶段】
to成长中的你：
- 高中生、大学生账本：生活费聪明花，课外兼职也能记
- 班费账本：班委管钱大家看，班费收支更透明
to工作中的你：
- 差旅报销流水账：流水详尽不漏报
- 网约司机、健身教练、装修队长：职业账本专属定制
to爱生活的你：
- 合租、恋爱、生活账：日常生活随心记
- 旅游、宠物、爱好账：为自己所爱的事物，记录美好回忆
- 攒钱、健身、目标账：设定一个小目标，让账本陪你变成想要的样子
to创业中的你：
- 奶茶、快餐、餐饮业：店铺经营实用工具
- 服装、代购、零售业：成本营收全把控，应收应付不遗漏
- 培训、酒店、服务业：各行各业全覆盖，首页报表指导经营
to顾家的你：
- 人情账本、结婚账本：人情红包收入支出一览无余
- 儿童教育、宝宝账本：家人共享宝贝成长点滴
- 汽车、储蓄家庭账本：日常生活分类全，全家合记一本账
还有更多账本模板等你发现！

【专业记账，省心易用】
- 记一笔：多人协同共同记账，随时随地记一笔
- 账本首页：首页即报表，数据卡片及图表让财务状况一目了然
- 流水：从各个维度查看收支情况，拒绝糊涂账
- 账户：全面了解你的各账户余额，手有余粮心不慌

————献给热爱记账的你————
生活需要一点仪式感。 有人每天早上一定要喝一杯咖啡， 有人每天睡前一定要写两句日记， 也有人每天都把挣到的和花过的每一分钱记录下来 在快节奏的时代，扫一扫就完成付款，动动手指就能解决三餐、完成购物。 移动支付把生活中的花销从实实在在的钱变成了一串变动的数字，很多时候我们对于花钱没有了概念，甚至，想不起来把钱花在了哪里。 这时，需要消费后的用心记账，提高自己对钱的敏感度。 希望热爱记账的你梳理财务状况的时候可以沉浸在随手记这个“工作台”！

【联系我们】 使用过程中如遇问题，欢迎联系我们，可爱的客服妹纸会认真处理你的每一个反馈哦。
- 在线客服："我的"-"求助反馈"-“功能咨询”/“业务咨询”
- 留言路径：“我的”-“求助反馈”-“意见反馈”
- 随手记官网：www.sui.com
- 随手记微信：suishoujicom
- 随手记服务条款：https://www.sui.com/help/agreement-mobile.html
- 随手记隐私政策：https://www.sui.com/help/privacy.jsp
如果您喜欢随手记，请在应用商店留下您的星星和评论，您的支持是我们进步的动力！

hk.releaseNotes: ・修復了戰鬥中與聲音穩定性相關的問題。
hk.description:
稀有物品！ 轉職！ 以及宏大的故事。
極致成就要素滿滿的正統砍殺類RPG遊戲“Knight & Dragon”第三彈！

《Knight & Dragon III》是基於中世紀奇幻世界觀構建的砍殺類RPG遊戲的第三彈。

故事始於某天早晨，你從突然到訪的老紳士那裏收到了正式公會成員證書，前往格林加爾德共和國的小村莊赴任。 共和國中發生的各種事件、與鄰國林達爾帝國的紛爭、騎士與龍的故事，最終都將成為圍繞星辰的宏大命運旋渦，將你卷入其中。

【Knight & Dragon III的特點】
▽沿襲前作的極致成就型RPG的基本係統，如白熱化的實時戰鬥、稀有物品掉落和轉職等！
▽實時戰鬥的互動性更強，可以判斷對手的攻擊時機，進行閃避、格擋、反擊等！
▽新增了豐富的武器類物品，如斧頭、長槍、戟等！ 還可以創建自己喜歡的角色，如雙手持武器或二刀流等！
▽新增的世界地圖為宏大的故事增添色彩！ 故事篇幅超越前作，同時保留了通關後內容！
▽此外，在本作中，通過各具特點的豐富NPC登場，以及地名、街市名稱等專有名詞，描繪了宏大的故事！
▽另外，遊戲當然也延續了前作中備受好評的功能，如隊伍派遣、人格面具功能等！

・・・

如您想在購買前體驗遊戲氛圍，前作《ナイト・アンド・ドラゴン：王国の騎士》可以免費遊玩，請務必試玩一下。

官方網站
http://dgjam.com/knightdragon3

Gerçekler karanlıkta kalmaz…
İstanbul’un sokakları, tarihi yapıları ve karanlık sırları arasında geçen bu dedektiflik bulmacasında, her bölüm yeni bir vakayı çözmek için seni bekliyor.

Delil Zinciri, bölüm bölüm ilerleyen, şüphelileri sorguladığın ve kanıtları bir araya getirerek gizemi çözdüğün sürükleyici bir dedektiflik oyunudur. Oyunun kalbinde kart temelli sorgulama sistemi bulunuyor:

Tanıkları çapraz sorguya al,
Arşivleri tarayarak bilgi topla,
Özel araçlar ile izleri bul,
Şüphelilerin tutarsız ifadelerini ortaya çıkar!
Her bölüm İstanbul’un farklı bir semtinde geçiyor: Galata’nın dar sokaklarından, Kadıköy’deki eski bir sahaf dükkanına kadar birçok farklı ve gizemli mekânda, yeni ipuçları seni bekliyor...

hk.description:
多年前，一艘神秘的船隻悄悄將珍貴的貨物走私到異國。 
《FRAMED》系列作的獨立篇章。
改變順序，扭轉結局。

《FRAMED 2》是一款黑色調益智遊戲，玩家可以調動播放動畫的漫畫格子順序，改變故事結局。

《FRAMED》是小島秀夫心目中的 2014 年最佳遊戲，而續作《FRAMED 2》的場景則回到第一代遊戲事件發生之前。

《FRAMED 2》專為 iPhone、iPad 和 iPod Touch iOS 9.0 以上版本設計。

已為 iPhone 5 以上和 iPad Air 以上版本進行優化。

LoveShack Entertainment 為澳洲的獨立遊戲開發商。
www.loveshackentertainment.com 歡迎追蹤 @LoveShackers，別錯過更新消息和新遊戲快訊。

玩法简介
翻牌收集表情鸡：翻开卡牌，收集各种造型夸张、情绪爆棚的尖叫鸡表情包！
趣味合成升级：3只相同表情的尖叫鸡就能合成新等级，外形更可爱，尖叫声也更魔性！
技能卡反转战局：使用搞怪技能卡，比如“群体尖叫”“强制合成”“鸡飞狗跳”，让战局瞬间翻盘！

玩法简介
翻牌收集表情鸡：翻开卡牌，收集各种造型夸张、情绪爆棚的尖叫鸡表情包！
趣味合成升级：3只相同表情的尖叫鸡就能合成新等级，外形更可爱，尖叫声也更魔性！
技能卡反转战局：使用搞怪技能卡，比如“群体尖叫”“强制合成”“鸡飞狗跳”，让战局瞬间翻盘！

hk.releaseNotes:
ver1.2.8
Some features have been adjusted.
hk.description:
[Warning] Please Read Before Purchasing
No refunds (including exchanges for other products, services, etc.) are available after purchase, regardless of the reason.
Please ensure that your device is compatible via the app's Contact page (link below).
https://bnfaq.channel.or.jp/title/3152

You are purchasing a license for digital goods. For full terms and conditions, please see the License Agreement below.

[Game Summary]
A Naruto game full of 3D competitive action!
NARUTO: Ultimate Ninja STORM finally makes its way to smartphones!
Experience the stories and battles of Naruto's childhood through beautiful graphics!

Game Content
Ultimate Mission Mode
Relive the stories and famous battles from Naruto's childhood! You can freely move around the Hidden Leaf Village and take on missions and mini games!

Free Battle Mode
In Free Battle Mode, you can choose from 25 unique characters from Naruto's childhood and 10 support characters to enjoy a variety of powerful ninjutsu actions and battles! 

Changes for the App
Easily activate ninjutsu, ultimate jutsu, and other actions with a tap! Even those playing the series for the first time can confidently enjoy the game!
Plus, the following additional features and improvements have made the game easier to play:
- New auto-save feature
- New control mode selection for battle (casual/manual)
- New battle assist feature (casual only)
- Improved controls for battle and free movement
- New retry feature for missions
- Improved mini-game UI
- Improved tutorial

Play Notes
- This game contains violent content.
- Please pay attention to how long you play and avoid excessive gameplay.
- 本遊戲部份內容涉及暴力情節
- 請注意遊戲時間,避免沉迷

[Number of Players]
This is a single-player game only.

[Storage]
To download this app, you will need at least 3.5 GB of free space.
When downloading, please ensure you have a strong internet connection and/or Wi-Fi environment.
*Depending on your device, you may need more than the suggested storage amount.
 
[Online]
- There is no online battle mode.
- Aside from the initial game download, you can play offline.
- An internet connection is required to back up and transfer game data.

[Game Summary]
A Naruto game full of 3D competitive action!
NARUTO: Ultimate Ninja STORM finally makes its way to smartphones!
Experience the stories and battles of Naruto's childhood through beautiful graphics!

Game Content
Ultimate Mission Mode
Relive the stories and famous battles from Naruto's childhood! You can freely move around the Hidden Leaf Village and take on missions and mini games!

Free Battle Mode
In Free Battle Mode, you can choose from 25 unique characters from Naruto's childhood and 10 support characters to enjoy a variety of powerful ninjutsu actions and battles! 

Changes for the App
Easily activate ninjutsu, ultimate jutsu, and other actions with a tap! Even those playing the series for the first time can confidently enjoy the game!
Plus, the following additional features and improvements have made the game easier to play:
- New auto-save feature
- New control mode selection for battle (casual/manual)
- New battle assist feature (casual only)
- Improved controls for battle and free movement
- New retry feature for missions
- Improved mini-game UI
- Improved tutorial

tw.description:
《旋轉音律》是一款活用了手機陀螺儀功能的體感音樂遊戲。力求帶來前所未有的嶄新音樂遊戲體驗。 旋轉手機，感受在星河間穿梭的快感。帶上耳機，共赴鼓點與星光相伴宇宙之旅。

 =用體感，玩音樂= 
不同於傳統音遊的點按式判定，在《旋轉音律》中，你需要通過快速旋轉手機來完成部分音符的判定——就像駕駛賽車穿越急彎那樣。這將會是如同街機般爽快的音樂遊戲體驗。

 =風格多變的音樂曲目= 
眾多音遊知名曲師參與供稿並提供獨家曲目！電音、JPOP、西方歌劇、韓文流行、重金搖滾，風格多樣不單調。更有豐富新曲目定期加入遊戲曲庫。

 =夢與約定之地，愛與成長之旅= 
跟隨伊洛踏上宇宙之旅，追尋友人的足跡，邂逅不同星球的居民，拯救阿古亞星的命運。一路見證伊洛的成長吧！


※因遊戲內容涉及「性」-遊戲角色穿著凸顯性特徵之服飾或裝扮但不涉及性暗示，依遊戲軟體分級管理辦法分類為「輔導十二歲級」。
※問題回饋：rotaeno@xd.com

tw.releaseNotes: ・修復了戰鬥中與聲音穩定性相關的問題。
tw.description:
稀有物品！ 轉職！ 以及宏大的故事。
極致成就要素滿滿的正統砍殺類RPG遊戲“Knight & Dragon”第三彈！

《Knight & Dragon III》是基於中世紀奇幻世界觀構建的砍殺類RPG遊戲的第三彈。

故事始於某天早晨，你從突然到訪的老紳士那裏收到了正式公會成員證書，前往格林加爾德共和國的小村莊赴任。 共和國中發生的各種事件、與鄰國林達爾帝國的紛爭、騎士與龍的故事，最終都將成為圍繞星辰的宏大命運旋渦，將你卷入其中。

【Knight & Dragon III的特點】
▽沿襲前作的極致成就型RPG的基本係統，如白熱化的實時戰鬥、稀有物品掉落和轉職等！
▽實時戰鬥的互動性更強，可以判斷對手的攻擊時機，進行閃避、格擋、反擊等！
▽新增了豐富的武器類物品，如斧頭、長槍、戟等！ 還可以創建自己喜歡的角色，如雙手持武器或二刀流等！
▽新增的世界地圖為宏大的故事增添色彩！ 故事篇幅超越前作，同時保留了通關後內容！
▽此外，在本作中，通過各具特點的豐富NPC登場，以及地名、街市名稱等專有名詞，描繪了宏大的故事！
▽另外，遊戲當然也延續了前作中備受好評的功能，如隊伍派遣、人格面具功能等！

・・・

如您想在購買前體驗遊戲氛圍，前作《ナイト・アンド・ドラゴン：王国の騎士》可以免費遊玩，請務必試玩一下。

us.releaseNotes:
In future updates: "Atheism" Archetype - and much more!
Don't miss out - Religion Inc. in the GameFirst Bundle and save on our other games by GameFirst!
Thank you for your awesome support and reviews!
us.description:
You are reading this text.
 But why?
 Are you looking for a game,
 or has the game found you?
 Religion Inc. is more than just a strategy game.
 It is a simulation of creating a new reality.
 Will you shape faith,
 or will faith shape you?
 Humanity has always sought light in the darkness.
 It has always longed to believe in something greater,
 something that gives meaning to existence.
 That’s how religions were born –
 as beacons in the storms of history,
 as compasses in the ocean of life.
 What if you become the creator of a religion?
 What if you could build your own faith, your own truth, your own reality?
You are the Creator.
 You are the source.
 You are the inspiration.
 And if you are reading this text – you’re already in the game!
 All that’s left is to install – and enjoy the process, the simulation of creating religions!

 Become the source of faith – in the strategy simulator Religion Inc.

 Humanity has always felt the need to believe in something greater than itself. Throughout history, people have searched for a light that could guide them through the darkness of the ages. For millions, that light became faith. Religion became a beacon, helping many find meaning in this world, weather the storms of change, and discover a path to happiness.

 There are many religions in the world, each shaped by its time and its challenges. But how else could this process have developed? What other fascinating and diverse forms could human beliefs have taken? The answers await you in our new game! Create your own unique religion, test its strength through the trials of time, and see if it can lead humanity to unity.

Game Features
*A variety of religious archetypes with unique cultural values and traditions!
*Unlock all archetypes through gameplay: monotheism, spiritualism, pantheon, shamanism, paganism, and many more!
*Will your followers become devoted fanatics or achieve higher enlightenment? The choice is yours!
*Hundreds of real-world religious aspects – and even more to come! Learn more about world religions!
*Unique active abilities for each archetype – perform miracles and change the world!
*Relaxing gameplay, perfect for an evening break: collect faith points with simple clicks and explore various religious aspects. Play at your own pace and enjoy!

Create your own unique religion by combining different religious aspects in the strategic simulator – Religion Inc.

Peace and love to all, brothers and sisters!

us.releaseNotes: - Fixed an issue related to sound stability during battles.
us.description:
Rare Items! Class Change! And an epic story.
The third installment of the full-fledged hack-and-slash RPG "Knight and Dragon," packed with replayability!

"Knight and Dragon 3" is the third installment in the hack-and-slash RPG series set in a medieval fantasy world.

One morning, after receiving a certificate from an elderly gentleman, proving you as a full-fledged guild member, you are sent to a small village in the Republic of Gringard. This is where the story begins. Various incidents occurring in the Republic, the conflicts with the neighboring Lindahl Empire, and the story of knights and dragons will eventually involve you in a grand destiny revolving around the stars.

[Features of Knight and Dragon 3]
▽ The basic systems of a replayable RPG such as intense real-time battles, rare item drops, and class changes are inherited from the previous game!
▽ Real-time battles are now more interactive, allowing you to dodge, parry, and counter by reading the enemy’s attack timings!
▽ A variety of weapons like axes, spears, and halberds appear among the items! Additionally, you can create characters to your liking, including dual-wielding and two-handed weapons!
▽ A world map that enhances the epic story is introduced! The story, with even more volume than the previous game, and the end content are still going strong!
▽ Moreover, in this game, a diverse range of NPCs with unique characteristics, place names, city names, and other proper nouns depict the grand story!
▽ Other features such as party dispatch and the Persona function, which were well received in the previous game, are of course continued!

・・・

For those who want to get a feel for the game before purchasing, the previous game "Knight and Dragon" is completely free to enjoy, so please give it a try.

Official Homepage
http://dgjam.com/knightdragon3

Truths don't stay in the dark...
In this detective puzzle set among the streets, historical buildings, and dark secrets of Istanbul, each chapter awaits you to solve a new case.

Evidence Chain is a gripping detective game that progresses chapter by chapter, where you interrogate suspects and piece together evidence to solve the mystery. At the heart of the game is a card-based interrogation system:

Cross-examine witnesses,
Gather information by scouring archives,
Find traces with specialized tools,
Expose suspects' inconsistent statements!
Each chapter takes place in a different district of Istanbul: From the narrow streets of Galata to an old secondhand bookstore in Kadıköy, new clues await you in a variety of mysterious locations.

us.trackName: Speech to Text : Voice to Text
us.description:
Speech to text : Voice to text  is the powerful, real-time dictation solution. Based on the latest artificial intelligence and using a powerful speech recognition engine, This Dictation app accurately transcribes your speech to text in real time. 

The clean elegant design, along with the non-stop voice recognition and other features means you can relax and focus on your thoughts and content.

Using our app , your words will be magically transcribed into text without your ever needing to touch a keyboard. Now you can use the power of your voice to create your words!

Easily share your text and files later! (Works with Evernote, Dropbox, Google Drive, OneDrive, Facebook, Twitter, Snapchat, WhatsApp and other iOS supported sharing apps.)


Whether you’re a professional writer, doctor, lawyer, disabled or somehow prevented from traditional typing, Speech to text : Voice to text app will swiftly solve your transcription problems and help you achieve your writing goals today!



This fantastic speech-to-text app will allow you to do more with your iPhone/ iPad :

・Longer Record time:
 -DICTATE CONTINUOUSLY up-to 1 HOUR.

・Unlimited save & edits

・Transcribed text can be edited directly.
・Ideal for both individual and group transcription
・Background support for voice recognition.
・On-device Speech Recognition.

• Voice recognition support for 59 languages and accents.
• Share your text on social networks.
• Copy your text to other apps.
• Send your text as an email or text message.

• Create PDF instantly with single click.
• Convert text your notes, reports, letters into PDF instantly
• Text Analysis using AI.

►  Currently Supported Speech Recognition Languages: Arabic, Cantonese, Catalan, Chinese, Croatian, Czech, Danish, Dutch, English, Finnish, French, German, Greek, Hebrew, Hindi, Hungarian, Indonesian, Italian, Japanese, Korean, Malay, Norwegian, Bokmål, Polish, Portuguese, Romanian, Russian, Shanghainese, Slovak, Spanish, Swedish, Thai, Turkish, Ukrainian, Vietnamese.

Technology:
New iOS 14 Speech framework having state of the art accuracy,
Faster ,Automatically adapts to the user

Super easy: Simply click the microphone and start dictating. No need to login or register

You can add new paragraphs, punctuation marks, smileys and other special characters using simple voice commands.

Who Should Use Speech to Text : Voice to Text ?

tr.description:
Rare Items! Class Change! And an epic story.
The third installment of the full-fledged hack-and-slash RPG "Knight and Dragon," packed with replayability!

"Knight and Dragon 3" is the third installment in the hack-and-slash RPG series set in a medieval fantasy world.

One morning, after receiving a certificate from an elderly gentleman, proving you as a full-fledged guild member, you are sent to a small village in the Republic of Gringard. This is where the story begins. Various incidents occurring in the Republic, the conflicts with the neighboring Lindahl Empire, and the story of knights and dragons will eventually involve you in a grand destiny revolving around the stars.

[Features of Knight and Dragon 3]
▽ The basic systems of a replayable RPG such as intense real-time battles, rare item drops, and class changes are inherited from the previous game!
▽ Real-time battles are now more interactive, allowing you to dodge, parry, and counter by reading the enemy’s attack timings!
▽ A variety of weapons like axes, spears, and halberds appear among the items! Additionally, you can create characters to your liking, including dual-wielding and two-handed weapons!
▽ A world map that enhances the epic story is introduced! The story, with even more volume than the previous game, and the end content are still going strong!
▽ Moreover, in this game, a diverse range of NPCs with unique characteristics, place names, city names, and other proper nouns depict the grand story!
▽ Other features such as party dispatch and the Persona function, which were well received in the previous game, are of course continued!

・・・

For those who want to get a feel for the game before purchasing, the previous game "Knight and Dragon" is completely free to enjoy, so please give it a try.

Official Homepage
http://dgjam.com/knightdragon3

Truths don't stay in the dark...
In this detective puzzle set among the streets, historical buildings, and dark secrets of Istanbul, each chapter awaits you to solve a new case.

Evidence Chain is a gripping detective game that progresses chapter by chapter, where you interrogate suspects and piece together evidence to solve the mystery. At the heart of the game is a card-based interrogation system:

Cross-examine witnesses,
Gather information by scouring archives,
Find traces with specialized tools,
Expose suspects' inconsistent statements!
Each chapter takes place in a different district of Istanbul: From the narrow streets of Galata to an old secondhand bookstore in Kadıköy, new clues await you in a variety of mysterious locations.

The clean elegant design, along with the non-stop voice recognition and other features means you can relax and focus on your thoughts and content.

Using our app , your words will be magically transcribed into text without your ever needing to touch a keyboard. Now you can use the power of your voice to create your words!

Easily share your text and files later! (Works with Evernote, Dropbox, Google Drive, OneDrive, Facebook, Twitter, Snapchat, WhatsApp and other iOS supported sharing apps.)


Whether you’re a professional writer, doctor, lawyer, disabled or somehow prevented from traditional typing, Speech to text : Voice to text app will swiftly solve your transcription problems and help you achieve your writing goals today!



This fantastic speech-to-text app will allow you to do more with your iPhone/ iPad :

・Longer Record time:

・Unlimited save & edits

・Transcribed text can be edited directly.
・Ideal for both individual and group transcription

• Share your text on social networks.

Explore a world made of blocks as you gather, craft, and build to defeat the evil Dragonlord! Build everywhere from anywhere in DRAGON QUEST BUILDERS, available now on mobile. Brought to you by SQUARE ENIX!

◆ TRAVEL AND EXPLORE THE VAST WORLD OF DRAGON QUEST!
In this “Block-Building RPG”, YOU are the legendary builder that has the power to build! The realm of Alefgard has been plunged into darkness by the terrible and treacherous Dragonlord, the ruler of all monsters. Venture off on the epic adventure to restore Alefgard!

◆ FACE OFF AGAINST VICIOUS FOES!
You will encounter Slimes, Golems, Dragons, and more. Familiar DRAGON QUEST monsters of all sizes threaten the survival of humankind! Craft weapons, build defenses, and fight the monsters to protect your base. Use your power to build and play smart when fighting against frightening enemies in action packed combat!

◆ GATHER, CRAFT AND BUILD FROM ANYWHERE!
In this world made of blocks, everything you see can be materials used to create! Farm ingredients, craft various items and build your base to unite the people roaming the ruins.  From buildings to entire towns, you have the freedom to make your village your very own. The power to build is in the palm of your hands!

◆ BUILD BETTER ON MOBILE WITH SPECIAL FEATURES ADDED!
Place blocks by simply tapping the screen and destroy blocks and items more easily with specialized cursors. A convenient Undo Button function has also been added to allow you to restore your work! 
Convert your buildings in to Build Cards to share with friends and scan their buildings to have them show up in your island!
◆ NEW DLC AS IN-APP PURCHASES
New DLC added in “Terra Incognita,” the land where you can freely build and play!
DLC includes:
• “Magic carpet”, “Boss figure pack”, “Celestial pack”, “Dot ring”
• “All in one pack” (A set of the above 4)

tr.description:
MOTORSPORT MANAGER 4: MASTER RACE STRATEGY

BUILD YOUR RACING DYNASTY
Immerse yourself in the captivating journey of constructing your motorsport empire from the ground up, where every choice holds the key to your success.

ASSEMBLE YOUR DREAM TEAM
Hand-pick exceptional drivers and engineer a world-class racing powerhouse. Collaborate closely with drivers to secure pole positions and craft pitstop strategies that lead to race domination.

REAL-TIME STRATEGY UNFOLDS
Experience the adrenaline-pumping action of races in real-time or navigate through intricate strategy screens. Swiftly adapt to ever-changing weather, unexpected crashes, and the emergence of safety cars.

UNLEASH VARIETY ON THE TRACK
Embark on thrilling GT and Endurance racing adventures across six distinct championships. Immerse yourself in the iconic beauty of Monaco's settings, rendered in breathtaking artistry.

DRIVERS TAKE CENTER STAGE
Step into the shoes of promising new drivers, delve into their statistics, and cultivate pivotal relationships. Navigate the revamped HQ, seize upgrade opportunities, and master the new part development system for an immersive journey.

YOUR JOURNEY, YOUR CHALLENGE
Embark on a motorsport odyssey where every choice shapes your destiny. Witness dynamic AI team movements and adjust the difficulty level as the game evolves with you.

SEIZE CONTROL, MAKE HISTORY
It's your opportunity to rewrite the annals of racing lore and etch your name into the history of motorsport. Motorsport Manager 4 empowers you like never before.

tr.description:
You are reading this text.
 But why?
 Are you looking for a game,
 or has the game found you?
 Religion Inc. is more than just a strategy game.
 It is a simulation of creating a new reality.
 Will you shape faith,
 or will faith shape you?
 Humanity has always sought light in the darkness.
 It has always longed to believe in something greater,
 something that gives meaning to existence.
 That’s how religions were born –
 as beacons in the storms of history,
 as compasses in the ocean of life.
 What if you become the creator of a religion?
 What if you could build your own faith, your own truth, your own reality?
You are the Creator.
 You are the source.
 You are the inspiration.
 And if you are reading this text – you’re already in the game!
 All that’s left is to install – and enjoy the process, the simulation of creating religions!

 Become the source of faith – in the strategy simulator Religion Inc.

 Humanity has always felt the need to believe in something greater than itself. Throughout history, people have searched for a light that could guide them through the darkness of the ages. For millions, that light became faith. Religion became a beacon, helping many find meaning in this world, weather the storms of change, and discover a path to happiness.

 There are many religions in the world, each shaped by its time and its challenges. But how else could this process have developed? What other fascinating and diverse forms could human beliefs have taken? The answers await you in our new game! Create your own unique religion, test its strength through the trials of time, and see if it can lead humanity to unity.

Game Features
*A variety of religious archetypes with unique cultural values and traditions!
*Unlock all archetypes through gameplay: monotheism, spiritualism, pantheon, shamanism, paganism, and many more!
*Will your followers become devoted fanatics or achieve higher enlightenment? The choice is yours!
*Hundreds of real-world religious aspects – and even more to come! Learn more about world religions!
*Unique active abilities for each archetype – perform miracles and change the world!
*Relaxing gameplay, perfect for an evening break: collect faith points with simple clicks and explore various religious aspects. Play at your own pace and enjoy!

Create your own unique religion by combining different religious aspects in the strategic simulator – Religion Inc.

Peace and love to all, brothers and sisters!

tr.description:
A game about positive impact on nature and eco-friendly living. 
Ecology strategy games where you reconnect with nature and create a green world for future civilizations. Take on the role of a planet protection fund and stabilize its environmental situation. Join the global movement to save the planet Earth!

About game ECO inc. Save The Earth:
* Take on the role of a planet protection fund and develop environmental initiatives.
* Various game mechanics: from resource management to diplomacy.
* Complex tasks and unexpected events that will test your strategic thinking.
* An opportunity to make a real contribution to saving the planet by raising awareness of environmental issues.
*Global Challenges: Climate change, environmental pollution, resource depletion - all these challenges require your solution. Don't let the environmental catastrophe spread like a "plague" across the planet Earth.
*Strategic Planning: Develop long-term plans, consider all factors, and make fateful 
decisions that will determine the future of the Earth.
*Economic Development: Manage resources, invest in new technologies and build a green future world.
*Volunteering: Send your heroes to help those in need, participate in international projects and fight for a clean planet.
* Education: Raise your eco-awareness, study real problems and find ways to solve them.

How to play the planet saving game tutorial guide:
The player's goal is to stabilize the environmental situation on the entire planet at an early stage.
Then, step by step, restore and improve the eco-situation of the Earth. Yeah, it's an epic quest ;)
At the end of the game, you will receive statistics on how successful your mission was.
Each step leads to different consequences, you will need to take thoughtful and quick actions.

Useful information:
Green Days: Eco Calendar — your personal guide to the planet’s most important environmental events!
Follow Earth Days, Forest Days, Ocean Days, and Biodiversity Days. Plan your eco-actions and help make the world greener!

List of Global Green Holidays:

February 2 — World Wetlands Day
March 3 — World Wildlife Day
March 21 — International Day of Forests
March 22 — World Water Day
March 23 — World Meteorological Day
April 7 — World Health Day (eco-focus)
April 22 — Earth Day
May 22 — International Day for Biological Diversity
June 5 — World Environment Day
June 8 — World Oceans Day
June 17 — World Day to Combat Desertification and Drought
July 28 — World Nature Conservation Day
September 16 — International Day for the Preservation of the Ozone Layer
October 4 — World Animal Day
October 13 — International Day for Disaster Risk Reduction
November 6 — International Day for Preventing the Exploitation of the Environment in War and Armed Conflict
December 11 — International Mountain Day

Join millions of eco heroes around the world and become part of the global movement to save the planet! :)
